name: Super Tramp
description:
Super Tramp's girl friend Peach, is trapped in a cage at the end of a unnecessarily perilous labyrinth! If you can stay alive long enough you might just save her!

◊ Dodge and dive through a seemingly impossible jungle of pipes and spinning buzz saws!

◊ Awesome Golden Cap power up

◊ Perform incredible acrobatics just to stay alive for a few seconds longer!!

◊ Be prepared to die - a lot!!!!

Super Tramp is available at the iOS App Store:

https://itunes.apple.com/gb/app/super-tramp/id827241505?mt=8
